title: FS Passenger X with Crack
description:
I have made the Fsp working again, instead of having 2 torrent i decided to delete those two and make this one.....


How to Install.
 
 - Install FsPassenger

 - go to you FSX main folder and find the folder "FsPassenger"

 - Open the second folder in this torrent "bin folder"

 - Find the gamedata.bin file

 - copy this file into the FsPassenger folder (the one you opened previously)
 
 - Say yes to overwrite

 - That should do it.

Many thx to English_bob for the help and information


best regards
